creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: female ghost with sharply pointed eyes; toothy grin with pointy black and white teeth; woman is running PL hand through her scraggly black hair; white robe falling down shoulders; woman is rising from forked white and red flames emanating from a skull at LRC
medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk
title: Ghost
